Introduction

Choi Seobin, known under her stage name Vin, a South Korean singer and dancer under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as a member of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

On May 16, 2024, Vin was revealed as the sixth member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
